message.body: ########## hey its bryan from the marv - we have a 3-9 slot open tuesdays if you're interested - lemme know!

Hey Bryan I just applied for a couple of full time gigs, if I get them it will be unlikely that I can work At that time, but if I don't get them I can work. I'll let you know what happens. I could probably train for a shift or to if you need help ASAP in the short term though. Thanks for thinking of me
